COMMENT_TX: ej,bochb002,M,everm901,Balls and strikes on Nevin Padres Manager Bruce Bochy ejected by HP umpire Mike Everitt for arguing strike 1 to Phil Nevin from the dugout; he then ran to the plate and swiped a foot through the left-handed batter's box as if to indicate that was how far outside the pitch was
